abilities.name: Recount the Deeds of the Saints
abilities.rule: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Agathe Dolan model, each time that unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice. When that Agathae Dolan model is destroyed, you gain D3 Miracle dice.

abilities.name: Auto-Tapestry of the Emperor’s Judgement
abilities.rule: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Aestred Thurga model, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.
